title: E-commerce Website
description: An e-commerce website for online shopping
requirements: Implement user registration and authentication system
Create product listing and search functionality
Implement shopping cart and checkout process
Integrate secure payment gateway

title: Social Media Dashboard
description: A social media dashboard for managing social media activities
requirements: Implement user authentication and profile management
Create a news feed displaying posts from friends
Allow users to post status updates and media
Implement real-time chat feature

title: Recipe Sharing Platform
description: A recipe sharing platform for users to create, discover, and share recipes
requirements: Implement user registration and login system
Allow users to create, edit, and delete recipes
Create a search functionality for recipes
Implement a rating and review system

title: Event Booking Platform
description: An event booking platform for organizing and managing events
requirements: Implement user registration and authentication system
Allow event organizers to create and manage events
Provide event search and filtering functionality
Integrate a ticketing and payment system

title: Job Board Website
description: A job board website for posting and applying to job listings
requirements: Implement user registration and login system
Allow employers to post job listings
Enable job seekers to search and apply for jobs
Implement a messaging system between employers and job seekers
